nodes.text: The Battle of Lorshan Pass was the first large-scale battle of the Summertime War, and one of the last confrontations of the conflict. It resulted in a humiliating defeat for the Balawai militia at Lorshan Pass, although at a high cost of the Korunnai Upland Liberation Front. The Battle of Lorshan Pass was won mostly due to a risky, strategic maneuver by Jedi Master Mace Windu.
